name: Fantasy Horror Theme
description: Dark fantasy, cursed magic, ancient curses, forbidden knowledge, eldritch beings in medieval settings, the cost of power, the corruption of magic

writing_rules.message: WARNING: This theme explores the dark side of fantasy. Magic has a price, knowledge is dangerous, and power corrupts absolutely.

never_cheapen_magic: Never make magic look easy or without consequence. Every spell should have a cost.
Never explain magic completely. Some mysteries should remain.
Never make ancient evils defeatable by simple means. They should require sacrifice.

greetings: The {ancient_evil} stirs in its {resting_place}. The {ritual} must be completed.
{magic_artifact} calls to you. Its {power} comes with {price}.
The {kingdom} stands on the brink. {dark_force} gathers beyond the {barrier}.
They said the {spell} was safe. They lied.
The {bloodline} carries the curse. You are the last.
farewells: Take the {artifact}. Use it wisely. Or don't. It doesn't care.
The {barrier} weakens. They will come through soon.
Your {soul|body|mind} is the price. Was it worth it?

templates: A {adjective} adventure where {magic_system} corrupts all who use it. {player_action} triggers {consequence}.
The {ancient_evil} stirs. {ritual} must be performed to {goal}. The cost? {price}.
Wield {forbidden_artifact} with {power}. But {corruption_mechanic} grows with each use.
A {subgenre} game where {magic} rewrites reality. {player_choice} determines the {outcome}.
Navigate {cursed_kingdom} where {ancient_law} still holds power. {survival_mechanic} is your only hope.
magic_systems: a blood magic that requires increasingly personal sacrifices
a runic system where each symbol has a hidden cost
a spellweaving tradition that unravels the caster's mind
a divine magic that corrupts the faithful
a necromantic art that animates the dead at the cost of the living
ancient_evils: a slumbering god beneath the mountain
a cursed bloodline that spreads like a plague
a sentient forest that hungers for souls
a forgotten deity sealed in a magical artifact
a race of beings that exist between dimensions
corruption_mechanics: your body gradually transforms into something inhuman
your magic becomes more powerful but less controllable
your memories fade as your knowledge grows
your morality erodes with each spell cast
your reflection begins to move independently
artifacts: weapons that whisper secrets to their wielders
armor that remembers the sins of its previous owners
jewelry that grants wishes at a terrible cost
books that rewrite themselves based on the reader

moral_ambiguity: Create {situation} where {moral_dilemma} has no good outcome.

ancient_temple.central_paradox: The temple was built to contain the evil, but the containment ritual requires the evil to be active. The temple feeds what it was meant to starve.
untrustworthy_elements: statues that move when no one is looking
altars that require fresh blood to remain dormant
prayers that are answered by the wrong entities
treasures that vanish when removed from the temple

cursed_castle.central_paradox: The castle was built with magic to protect its inhabitants, but the magic has developed a mind of its own. It protects the castle, not the people inside.
untrustworthy_elements: doors that lead to different rooms based on the time of day
windows that show different views depending on who looks through them
servants who age rapidly while the nobility remains young
food that tastes delicious but provides no nourishment
mirrors that show reflections from other timelines

revelation_patterns: The {ritual} wasn't created by {apparent_creator} - it was created by {actual_creator}. The {evidence} was {misinterpreted_as} {incorrect_interpretation}.
